CompressionStream.summary: The CompressionStream interface of the compresses a stream of data. It implements the same shape as a , allowing it to be used in and similar methods.

CompressionStreamCompressionStream.summary: The CompressionStream() constructor creates a new object which compresses a stream of data.

CompressionStreamReadable.summary: The readable read-only property of the interface returns a that emits compressed data as {{jsxref("Uint8Array")}} chunks.

CompressionStreamWritable.summary: The writable read-only property of the interface returns a that accepts uncompressed data to be compressed, in the form of {{jsxref("ArrayBuffer")}}, {{jsxref("TypedArray")}}, or {{jsxref("DataView")}} chunks.
